title: Discover the new hypnosis at Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
Ancient hypnotists achieved results such as telepathy, clairvoyance, and non-local quantum effects through hypnotism without the use of words. There is a secret behind this ability, which connects to ancient hermetic and rosicrucian traditions. Dr. Paret was initiated in it and unveiled these techniques to the world, updating them for use with modern quantum techniques. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
